A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible. For those of us who grew up with the original movies they were an inspiration of hope\, daring\, and sacrifice. Now it is just a political vehicle to portray all men as buffoons\, all women as wise and patient\, and the end of lines between good and evil. Peppered with inane jokes and gapping plot holes; it would have been better had we just let it end after episodes four to six. Millennial\, build your world outlook film\, don't hijack mine.
